Question.Subject: Japanese online shop plz ?
Question.Content:
I want a Japanese online shop that is reliable, ships world-wide***, reasonable prices and sells stuff like this website www.thejapaneseconnection.com. this site is good but I don't know if it is trust worthy or not. also its prices are wwwwwwaaaaaaaaaaaayyyyyyyyyy too high.
*** That is very important cz now I live in the middle-east.
Question.ChosenAnswer: Hey man I think the best shop you could find is this www.thejapaneseconnection.com and you can use a shipping company but it still gonna cost u hell of a fortune.

Answer.Content: Hey man I think the best shop you could find is this www.thejapaneseconnection.com and you can use a shipping company but it still gonna cost u hell of a fortune.
